quote: When God lays His finger on your heart it cannot help but be filled with love for others, if that doesn't happen there is nothing wrong with God's finger there is something wrong with your heart
quote_letters: WHEN GOD LAYS HIS FINGER ON YOUR HEART IT CANNOT HELP BUT BE FILLED WITH LOVE FOR OTHERS IF THAT DOESNT HAPPEN THERE IS NOTHING WRONG WITH GODS FINGER THERE IS SOMETHING WRONG WITH YOUR HEART
